title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.21 - Spitting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.21 - Spitting

State Regulations

It shall be unlawful for any person to spit or expectorate in
any park or in or upon any park building, monument, structure or
equipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
